channel.title: CVE Feed for TigerVNC -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TigerVNC -- all products

item.title: CVE-2014-0011|2024-08-06T08:58:26.465Z -- tigervnc -- tigervnc
item.description: Multiple heap-based buffer overflows in the ZRLE_DECODE function in common/rfb/zrleDecode.h in TigerVNC before 1.3.1, when NDEBUG is enabled, allow remote VNC servers to cause a denial of service (vncviewer crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via vectors related to screen image rendering.
